segments.text: Room service . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to have an international call to Paris . Can you tell how to do it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . In that case , you should connect the operator and he will connect you with the one you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what is the operator's number ?
segments.speaker: S2
